content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-11.5, 18.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam engine (position -11.5, 18.5)
- Boiler (position -11.5, 25.0)
- Offshore pump (position -9.5, 24.5)
- Multiple pipes connecting these entities

### Copper plate mine at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position 0, 0) and a furnace (position 0, 0)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace (position y1)
- Assembling machine at position(z1) and inserter at position(a) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position) that connects the furnace at position y1 to assembling machine at position(z1)

### Lab at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab (position x)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting to electric poles
- Ensure that electric poles are properly placed and connected to the electricity network before attempting to connect them to other entities like labs. Check the status of electric poles to confirm they are plugged into the network.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing. Check for existing entities in the intended placement area.

### Errors related to power supply
- Verify that all entities requiring power are connected to a functioning electricity network. If an entity is not receiving power, check the connections and ensure that the power source is operational.
